column5: That's what I'm pretty sure it says to. It's a big yikes that she's actually invited after that.
YTA. Calling you insensitive was being very very nice.

Nathan has been self righteous to the point of selfishness since season 3. There's no thoughts except wanting to be with Audrey and spiting Duke. The moment he got that tatoo is when it really dawned on me that he stopped caring about anything except what he wanted to the point of not even thinking straight.
You contradict yourself every other comment

Some adults take pride in the fake that they don't have actual friends, just situational friends like co-workers or the parents of their kid's friends. It's sad and the attitude is a way of coping. Pitiful honestly.
You consider solo time with your daughter to be going to your parents place? I'm sorry to tell you that with 3 of you it's not solo time. You're just giving your daughter to someone else to babysit.
Oh that makes way more sense. Thank you
It's cause you are a thief. Not feel like. You stole and you lied and so you ARE a thief. That's how words work.
Honestly though you're a scammer and deserve the insults.
No one forced to post here. You're welcome to leave at any time. I'm sure you can find a site more suited to your ideals.
Why is the word baby in quotes?
I never said it's abuse. I said it was cruel. The first thing you said was NTA you laid out expectations and results and this kid has to learn the consequences.

Would I take away their devices? Yes. Would I reset those devices to factory settings? No. You saying that this kid is just having his bubble burst about how bad life is when he is only nine years old is a cruel way to think. You saying he's going to have to deal with worse as a reason to not feel upset over this is dismissive of the way  children develope what hurts them. It's hard to believe that if this is your response to this situation it isn't what it would be in others and people, especially vulnerable people, don't deserve that from anyone.
Not trying to troll just shocked by OP and all the people thinking this is just an oopise that is in some way excusable. You keep saying it's too far then giving reasons why it's really parenting.
You're defending it as a reasonable punishment if that's the reason the kid was waking up late. It would still be a cruel thing to do to a little kid.
You know you don't have to break the law to be a shitty parent right? That's the lowest point not the standard.

If this kid spent the last year learning to draw and they decided to burn all his artwork would that be okay? What if he was a writer and they burned his journal? You're right he's nine he probably doesn't have many hobbies he cares about or things he creates because he's proud of them. Your point about this kid going to experience worse lost is so unempathetic I'm honestly sad for you. Imagine saying why be sad you broke your leg because one day your parents will die. Kids are allowed to feel hurt by things that hurt them without adults making them feel stupid for it. Don't have kids until you learn to treat them kinder.

Oh yeah not waking up at 7am when the world has shut down makes the kid an asshole who deserves to have a year of work destroyed. That makes sense. Truly f them kids and what they create and are proud of.
Hobbies are only for babies. Stare at a wall with your free time. Don't love anything besides mummy and daddy or you're a terrible child.
YTA. The be civil rule is stopping what I actually want to say to you.
Consider a safe deposit box to die store them in.

Something to think about. My aunt does all the things you do for your husband and has for the last 30 years. Currently she has been quarentined in Florida with her dying mother due to the virus and spots only him and their daughter in their house in New York. Her daughter is now the one who has to do all the cleaning up after this grown man. You laugh but really you shouldn't enable this behavior unless you one day are okay with having your kids to be treated this way too when you're not there.
Wtf. Your boyfriend is being sexually harassed daily in his own home. Kick her out. Don't let her do that just cause she's your family.
You may think that about children, idk if it's from past experience or what, but most aren't that forgetful. Learn to treat them like humans with feelings and opinions. This isn't right.
Your son would need to be constantly crying for your husband to maybe see he was hurt by this.

Do you really think that just because the son stopped crying he's fine with what happened and should pretend nothing happened? Would he have to be crying from the time he wakes up everyday to sleep every night or he's not upset?
TIL sneaking up behind a kid with gardening scissors to cut their hair is actually "a perfect opportunity to build up boundaries" and not a crime like most laws classify it as
Who is there a conflict with here? Who thinks you're the asshole?
INFO. Is anyone mad at you here?

Is it possible you're embarrassed about needing a 12 year old to pay your bills and trying to rationalize it for yourself? It's okay to need help but you shouldn't be framing it as being for her benefit.
Also $24 a day is actually $720 a month. His one week of rent thing is a lie. He's charging closer to half his rent than a quarter.
Hey quick question. What do you think 1800 divided by 4 is?
They already do? This kid cuts lots of lawns in the neighborhood to support his mom. That's their whole point?
I got my comment deleted for calling someone's mom a cunt a while back. She was a major cunt though.
This makes me so happy

He has 0 standing to tell you "no" here. None.
You aren't entitled to that.
No you're considering standing up for them but asking the internet if you should or not. You haven't done anything yet.
Don't you know 11 year olds are basically toddlers with separation anxiety?
But cursing?!? Cursing!!! No no words are basically murder??? ESH
But KeEpInG tHe PeAcE

A grown man shows up to her place drunk with a weapon. He then starts off talking about how he wants to make her hurt and waving said weapon around. Saying he came there with the intention to make her hurt by destroying her car but was interrupted before committing that crime. You really don't think that would scare someone? I don't believe in that situation you wouldn't be fearing for your safety too. What he did was unhinged and dangerous.
Saying "I want to hurt you" while holding a bat is generally a threat. Which is what he did. She looks scared before he says what he thought of her. She should get a restraining order.
I actually think it was because he was threatening to hurt her while brandishing a bat.
It wasn't cute and I was so confused why no one, especially hospital security wasn't doing something or calling the police.
I hope she doesn't get into a relationship with someone who drunkenly yells about how much he wants to hurt her while brandishing a baseball bat. That was a scary situation.
Throw the whole country away.
What? This is a SpongeBob reference?
NTA. What a bitch move.

TIL customer service means letting people pick the lock when you're in the bathroom and watch you take a shit so they won't be offended.
